name: SmashPicker
0:
”Alexa, ask Smash Picker to choose four characters”
”Alexa, ask Smash Picker to pick a character”
”Alexa, ask Smash Picker to choose eight characters”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smash picker
des: Chooses from a list of preferred characters found in Smash Bros. 4. This is ideal for when you have a group of people who want to play random but also want to have an idea of who they'll be before the start of the match.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
